title: Enhancing Patient Care Practical Competencies: Flipped Learning-Based Scientific Competency Development Program

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of fundamental scientific concepts (high school level)
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can access pre-learning materials at least three times before 48 hours prior to class to master core concepts.
Learners achieve an 80%+ participation rate in scientific problem-solving discussions based on flipped learning materials during offline classes.
At the end of the course, learners can establish personalized learning strategies through pre-learning pattern analysis.
Learners score 70+ points on the summative assessment for scientific thinking application ability.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
